text.section: With the approval of the Board, the Governor shall dispose of unspent proceeds of an enabling act within 1 year after the termination of the State debt authorization under § 8-128 of this subtitle.

The Governor shall:
use the proceeds to reduce State debt authorizations, as provided in § 8-126(b) through (d) of this subtitle;
allocate the proceeds to the Construction Contingency Fund, as provided in § 3-609 of this article; or
order the proceeds to be credited to the Annuity Bond Fund, to pay the outstanding bonded indebtedness of the State.
The Board shall enforce the provisions of this section.
